Text: Thank you so much for this info!!! I really appreciate it, take care<3

Author: nicelikerice69
Text: Regarding the lax, definitely see a GI. I was told to cut them cold turkey and threw all of mine away. It takes a long time for your system to go back to “normal,” but it is worth it. Fiber would probably make things worse if you stop the laxatives, but everyone is different and your GI will know what is best. Good luck!
